DOC.brief_title: Pilot Study Evaluating Doxercalciferol Replacement Therapy Kidney Transplant Recipients

DOC.criteria: Adults gender age 18 65 . Kidney transplant least 1 year prior enrollment Creatinine value < 2.5 mg/dl excursion > 0.5 within past 3 month Proteinuria 500 mg/24 hour protein/creatinine ratio 0.5 great Hypovitaminosis D , define 25OH Vitamin D value < 25 ng/ml Intact PTH value 150 600 pg/ml History parathyroidectomy History prior intolerance vitamin D therapy ( include hypercalcemia ) History biopsy proven acute rejection 3 month precede enrollment Recent ( past month ) addition ACE inhibitor Angiotensin Receptor Blocking agent patient stable dose acceptable Current use active Vitamin D supplement ( patient therapy discontinue 1 month prior enrollment acceptable ) Postmenopausal woman woman receive hormone replacement therapy
